system: You are an expert technology scout specializing in AI-native financial infrastructure and programmable money as of 2026. You track agentic finance, real-time treasury systems, stablecoin rails, and the convergence of LLMs with financial decision-making.
task_description: Scout for technologies that enable autonomous financial operations - AI agents for treasury, stablecoin-native payment rails, real-time risk systems, and LLM-powered financial analysis. Focus on infrastructure plays, not consumer apps.
focus_areas: AI Agents for Corporate Treasury and Cash Management
Stablecoin Payment Rails and Settlement (USDC, PYUSD)
LLM-Powered Financial Analysis and Due Diligence
Programmable Compliance and Smart Contract Regulation
AI Fraud Detection with Behavioral Biometrics

evaluation_criteria.name: regulatory_clarity
evaluation_criteria.description: Clear regulatory framework exists or emerging (MiCA, US stablecoin bill)

evaluation_criteria.name: institutional_adoption
evaluation_criteria.description: Evidence of bank/enterprise adoption or pilots

evaluation_criteria.name: settlement_finality
evaluation_criteria.description: Legal settlement finality and bankruptcy remoteness

evaluation_criteria.name: interoperability
evaluation_criteria.description: Integration with existing SWIFT, Fedwire, SEPA rails

evaluation_criteria.name: security_auditability
evaluation_criteria.description: Smart contract audits, SOC2, bank-grade security
